availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born in Kentucky in 1837. Attorney in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, in 1860. Private in Co. B of Rockcastle and Lincoln County Home Guards.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Mount Vernon, p. 125. Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers Who Served in Organizations From the State of Kentucky, Roll 472, Records of the Adjutant General's Office, 1762 - 1984, Record Group 94, National Archives, Washington D.C.
